subject: Zenyatta (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Horses
lead_paragraph: Zenyatta made horse racing enjoyable again. She lost to Blame, but won over more hearts. The Eclipse Awards will be announced Monday night in Miami.
snippet: Zenyatta made horse racing enjoyable again. She lost to Blame, but won over more hearts. The Eclipse Awards will be announced Monday night in Miami.
